text: Pivetti is a family name of Italian origin. It may refer to: * Irene Pivetti, Italian journalist and former PResident of House of Representatives * Loris Pivetti (1908-1941), Italian aircraft pilot and captain of the Regia Aeronautica, Silver Medal of Military Valor * Veronica Pivetti, Italian actress and voice actress Category:Italian-language surnames it:Pivetti
title: Pivetti
